pages.index: BikeRent - Rent a bike in your city About us Our bikes Reviews Contact Us BikeRent: Your Ride Awaits in India Discover the vibrant streets of India with ease and freedom. Our bike rentals offer affordable, convenient options for every traveler. Explore at your own pace and experience the local culture like never before. Book Now Experience Freedom on Two Wheels with BikeRent At BikeRent, we believe in providing an exceptional biking experience for everyone. Our extensive range of bicycles ensures there's a perfect ride for every adventure. About Us BikeRent was founded with a passion for cycling and a mission to make bike rentals easy and accessible across India. Our high-quality bikes and exceptional customer service have made us a favorite among locals and tourists alike. We cater to all levels of cyclists, from beginners to seasoned riders. Mountain Bikes Road Bikes Hybrid Bikes Electric Bikes Kids' Bikes Tandem Bikes Folding Bikes Fat Bikes Our bikes Our Story Founded in India in 2019, BikeRent started with a simple vision: to make cycling accessible and enjoyable for everyone. From bustling cities to serene countryside, we wanted to give everyone the chance to explore the diverse landscapes of India on two wheels. Our journey began with a small fleet of bikes and a big dream. We aimed to offer not just bikes, but a seamless rental experience that would encourage people to ride more and discover new places. Over the years, we have grown significantly, expanding our services to numerous locations across India. Today, BikeRent boasts a wide assortment of bicycles, including mountain bikes, road bikes, hybrid bikes, electric bikes, and more. We cater to all kinds of riders, whether you're an adventurous trailblazer, a daily commuter, or a family on vacation. Our bikes are regularly maintained to ensure safety and comfort, providing a reliable ride for all our customers. Customer Reviews I had an amazing experience renting bikes from BikeRent. The process was smooth, and the bike was in excellent condition. Exploring the streets of India on a bike gave me a unique perspective of the city. Highly recommended! Ravi Kumar BikeRent offers a fantastic service! The staff were friendly and helpful, and the bike was perfect for my needs. I rented a mountain bike for a weekend trip and it handled the terrain beautifully. I will definitely use BikeRent again. Amit Patel Renting a bike from BikeRent made my trip to India unforgettable. The prices were reasonable, and the selection of bikes was impressive. I appreciated the flexibility and ease of the rental process. Thank you, BikeRent! Vikram Singh Why Choose Us? Experience the convenience and thrill of cycling with BikeRent. Our reliable services and top-quality bikes set us apart from the rest. Discover the advantages of renting with us: Wide Selection Choose from a diverse range of bikes to suit your preferences and needs. Whether you're an adventure seeker looking for a mountain bike or a city explorer in need of a comfortable hybrid, we have the perfect bike for you. Quality Assurance Rest assured that all our bikes are well-maintained and undergo regular inspections to ensure safety and performance. Our dedicated team meticulously checks each bike before rental, so you can enjoy a smooth and worry-free ride every time. Get in Touch Have questions? Drop us a message! pages.privacy: BikeRent - Privacy Policy About us Our bikes Reviews Contact Us Privacy Policy Your privacy is important to us. It is BikeRent's policy to respect your privacy regarding any information we may collect from you across our website and other sites we own and operate. 1. Information we collect We only collect information about you if we have a reason to do so — for example, to provide our services, to communicate with you, or to make our services better. We collect information in three ways: if and when you provide information to us, automatically through operating our services, and from outside sources. Let's go over the information that we collect. Information You Provide to Us We collect information that you provide to us. The amount and type of information depends on the context and how we use the information. Here are some examples: Basic Account Information: We ask for basic information from you in order to set up your account. For example, we require individuals who sign up for an account to provide an email address and password. Transaction and Billing Information: If you buy something from us— a rental service, for example —you will provide additional personal and payment information that is required to process the transaction and your payment, such as your name, credit card information, and contact information. Communications With Us: You may also provide us information when you respond to surveys, communicate with our team about a support question, or post a question about your site in our public forums. Information We Collect Automatically We also collect some information automatically: Log Information: Like most online service providers, we collect information that web browsers, mobile devices, and servers typically make available, such as the browser type, IP address, unique device identifiers, language preference, referring site, the date and time of access, operating system, and mobile network information. Usage Information: We collect information about your usage of our services. For example, we collect information about the actions that site administrators and users perform on a site. Location Information: We may determine the approximate location of your device from your IP address. We collect and use this information to, for example, calculate how many people visit our Services from certain geographic regions. 2. Use of personal information We may use personal information collected from you for various purposes, including to: Provide, operate, and maintain our website Improve, personalize, and expand our website Understand and analyze how you use our website Develop new products, services, features, and functionality Communicate with you, either directly or through one of our partners, including for customer service, to provide you with updates and other information relating to the website, and for marketing and promotional purposes Send you emails Find and prevent fraud 3. Security We are committed to securing your personal information and have implemented appropriate technical and organizational measures to protect your personal information from unauthorized access, use, or disclosure. 4. Contact Information If you have any questions about our Privacy Policy, please contact us at bikerent@gmail.com. Home Privacy policy Terms of Use +91-782-2619415
